remedi_style_dialogue_annotations.utterance_text: Hello, thank you for coming in today. I understand you’ve been experiencing diffuse abdominal pain and had an episode of non-bloody vomiting. Can you describe in more detail how your abdominal pain started and if it has changed in intensity or character since it began?

Uh, yeah… well, the main thing is this abdominal pain. It’s kind of all over, not just in one spot. It’s been going on since yesterday and, um, it just doesn’t seem to be letting up. That’s really what’s bothering me right now.

Thank you for explaining your symptoms in more detail. I’d like to understand if you’ve noticed any other associated symptoms, such as nausea, changes in appetite, or bloating, along with your abdominal pain?

remedi_labels.value: Thank you for explaining your symptoms in more detail.
other associated symptoms such as nausea, changes in appetite, or bloating along with abdominal pain

remedi_style_dialogue_annotations.utterance_text: Well, um… honestly, the abdominal pain is really what’s got me worried. It just feels pretty constant and uncomfortable. I haven’t really been able to get comfortable at all. That’s the main thing on my mind right now.

I can understand why you’d be anxious, especially with persistent abdominal pain that isn’t improving. To help guide my assessment, can you tell me if you’ve experienced any changes in your bowel movements or noticed any blood in your stool since your symptoms began?

remedi_labels.value: I can understand why you’d be anxious, especially with persistent abdominal pain that isn’t improving.
